page.title: 12HOME LIFE, BRIDGEND
page.content: Our school survey of 256 pupils' homes showed that 45 families lived in detatched houses, 127 in semidetatched 76 in terraced and 8 in bungalows. Of these 167 were privately owned and 89 council owned. We discovered that 60 mothers work fulltime, 95 part-time and 101 do not work outside the home. 197 fathers work fulltime, 13 part-time and 45 are unemployed. 58 families go to a place of worship regularly, 54 occasionally and 144 never. 107 children own a computer and 52 parents use a computer in their work.
